channel.title: Bank, trade and shop - (x) instead of "close window"
channel.description:
How am i supposed to change this "Close Window" interface on the bank, trading and shop interface to this "X" button down there? [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/5fjllk.png[/img]
Someone give me a very very EASY guide/tutorial and i'd be very happy.
My server & client base is: Ben 2012, Another version of Iclarity v1.05.
